◆ ToScrollPos()

int BrawlLib.Internal.Windows.Controls.Hex_Editor.HexBox.ToScrollPos ( long  value)
inlineprivate
1745 {
1746 int max = 65535;
1747
1748 if (_scrollVmax < max)
1749 {
1750 return (int) value;
1751 }
1752
1753 double valperc = value / (double) _scrollVmax * 100;
1754 int res = (int) Math.Floor(max / (double) 100 * valperc);
1755 res = (int) Math.Max(_scrollVmin, res);
1756 res = (int) Math.Min(_scrollVmax, res);
1757 return res;

◆ UpdateScrollSize()

void BrawlLib.Internal.Windows.Controls.Hex_Editor.HexBox.UpdateScrollSize ( )
inlineprivate
1687 {
1688 // calc scroll bar info
1689 if (VScrollBarVisible && _byteProvider != null && _byteProvider.Length > 0 && _iHexMaxHBytes != 0)
1690 {
1691 long scrollmax =
1692 (long) Math.Ceiling((_byteProvider.Length + 1) / (double) _iHexMaxHBytes - _iHexMaxVBytes);
1693 scrollmax = Math.Max(0, scrollmax);
1694
1695 long scrollpos = _startByte / _iHexMaxHBytes;
1696
1697 if (scrollmax < _scrollVmax)
1698 {
1699 /* Data size has been decreased. */
1700 if (_scrollVpos == _scrollVmax)
1701 {
1702 /* Scroll one line up if we at bottom. */
1703 PerformScrollLineUp();
1704 }
1705 }
1706
1707 if (scrollmax == _scrollVmax && scrollpos == _scrollVpos)
1708 {
1709 return;
1710 }
1711
1712 _scrollVmin = 0;
1713 _scrollVmax = scrollmax;
1714 _scrollVpos = Math.Min(scrollpos, scrollmax);
1715 UpdateVScroll();
1716 }
1717 else if (VScrollBarVisible)
1718 {
1719 // disable scroll bar
1720 _scrollVmin = 0;
1721 _scrollVmax = 0;
1722 _scrollVpos = 0;
1723 UpdateVScroll();
1724 }
1725 }

◆ vScrollBar_Scroll()

void BrawlLib.Internal.Windows.Controls.Hex_Editor.HexBox.vScrollBar_Scroll ( object  sender,
ScrollEventArgs  e 
)
inlineprivate
1624 {
1625 switch (e.Type)
1626 {
1627 case ScrollEventType.Last:
1628 break;
1629 case ScrollEventType.EndScroll:
1630 break;
1631 case ScrollEventType.SmallIncrement:
1632 PerformScrollLineDown();
1633 break;
1634 case ScrollEventType.SmallDecrement:
1635 PerformScrollLineUp();
1636 break;
1637 case ScrollEventType.LargeIncrement:
1638 PerformScrollPageDown();
1639 break;
1640 case ScrollEventType.LargeDecrement:
1641 PerformScrollPageUp();
1642 break;
1643 case ScrollEventType.ThumbPosition:
1644 long lPos = FromScrollPos(e.NewValue);
1645 PerformScrollThumpPosition(lPos);
1646 break;
1647 case ScrollEventType.ThumbTrack:
1648 // to avoid performance problems use a refresh delay implemented with a timer
1649 if (_thumbTrackTimer.Enabled) // stop old timer
1650 {
1651 _thumbTrackTimer.Enabled = false;
1652 }
1653
1654 // perform scroll immediately only if last refresh is very old
1655 int currentThumbTrack = Environment.TickCount;
1656 if (currentThumbTrack - _lastThumbtrack > THUMPTRACKDELAY)
1657 {
1658 PerformScrollThumbTrack(null, null);
1659 _lastThumbtrack = currentThumbTrack;
1660 break;
1661 }
1662
1663 // start thumbtrack timer
1664 _thumbTrackPosition = FromScrollPos(e.NewValue);
1665 _thumbTrackTimer.Enabled = true;
1666 break;
1667 case ScrollEventType.First:
1668 break;
1669 default:
1670 break;
1671 }
1672
1673 e.NewValue = ToScrollPos(_scrollVpos);
1674 }
